Arrow: I like to hear the squeals of the innocents, but destruction is the =
next best thing.

Deemos: I enjoy domination myself. We're going to have to=
 tell Razor what we've done since we've last seen him. I'm certain he will =
be very impressed with my story. Do you guys feel confident?

Arrow: I don'=
t really have much of a story...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Ro=
boRick007
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 1:48=
 AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Now that everyone =
was on the ship, Diesel hits the thrusters. There is a shake as the ship li=
fts off. Diesel avoids the anti-air weapons, and the ship heads away from C=
ybertron, for the Transwarp rift.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: Hollywood Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, Au=
gust 16, 2002 1:43 AM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    Deemos transfo=
rms and runs up. He climbs into the ship. Arrow is smiling a gap toothed gr=
in. He suddenly spins around and starts firing rapidly at every vehicle par=
ked in the lot with a gattling gun. He spins around, causing several ruined=
 vehicles and 2 explosions. A fuel leaks from about 98 percent of the vehic=
les fired upon. Arrow pulls a flamethrower from nowhere and fires, setting =
the entire place ablaze. Arrow, smiling evilly, finally walked up and climb=
ed into the ship...

      ----- Original Message -----
      From: RoboRic=
k007
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002=
 2:30 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

      A=
fter his blade cuts through several more Maximals, Diesel makes his way ont=
o the ship. Lucky for then it had no Maximals on board.

      Diesel poked=
 his head back out.

      Diesel: Arrow, Deemos, you guys coming?!
       =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 11:55 AM
       =
 Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                           =
                                                                           =
      : : Sting : :

                                               Sting w=
hips out a black energon baseball-bat like weapon.  He smacks a Maximal acr=
oss the head, actually knocking the head off.

                            =
                                                                     Sting:=
  Let's get the hell out of here!

                                        =
            He makes sure no Maximals can see him, and then he sneaks his w=
ay onto the ship, and waits for the others.
          ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
          From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

          Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 12:19 AM
          Subject: Re: =
Secret Messages


          : : Diesel : :

          He points a ship out =
in the distance.

          Diesel: I suggest that one. It's a military shi=
p. Shields, weapons, everything we'll need. The others all seem to be scien=
ce ships.

          Diesel pulled is sword from subspace. It began to glow=
 a crimson red and energy was emitted from it. Diesel was revealed as one o=
f the few "laser rod" fighters.

          Diesel: Let's go!

          He =
runs at the shuttle he had pointed out.

          Diesel does not get far =
before about twenty Maximals appear, all with plasma weapons. Diesel dives =
behind a science ship as plasma charges strike his former position.

      =
    The Maximals wait for smoke to clear, unsure if they had taken down the=
ir target. They hadn't. Diesel leaps at them his blade glowing, and slashes=
. Two Maximals bodies fall limp, their decapitated heads rolling at Diesel'=
s feet.

          Diesel: You guys wanna get involved here or what?

     =
     He is brought back to battle as two more shots bounce off his blade.

=
          Diesel: The hell with this!

          From Diesel's shoulders co=
me two rockets, which hit a hanger, causeing it to collaps on a group of Ma=
ximals standing outfront it...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
          From: LurkerAbyss 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
      Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 11:05 PM
            Subject: Re: Se=
cret Messages


                                                           =
                                                                    : : Sti=
ng : :

                                                                   =
                 Sting drives in and comes to a halt next to Diesel.  He tr=
ansforms to robot mode.

                                                  =
                                                Sting:  They're all quite n=
ice.  What do you guys think?
              ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
             From: RoboRick007 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
             Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 10:32 PM
              Subjec=
t: Re: Secret Messages


              : : Diesel : :

              Diesel=
 pulled up alongside Arrow and transformed to his robot mode.

            =
  Diesel: Ok, pick a ship, and lets get to the killing!
                ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                From: Hollywood Narrator 
      =
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, Augu=
st 14, 2002 9:17 PM
                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        =
        Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot. He transfo=
rms to robot mode.

                Arrow: This is my grand opportunity. I =
made an explosive exit last time...

                  ----- Original Messa=
ge -----
                  From: LurkerAbyss
                  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com
                  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 8:17 PM
 =
                 Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                           =
                                                                           =
                              : : Sting : :

                              =
                                                                           =
         Sting:  Alright, let's head out.

                                =
                                       He transforms into a scorpion vehicl=
e.  Basically, a scorpion on wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
      =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: RoboR=
ick007 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                   =
 Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 2:10 PM
                    Subject: Re: =
Secret Messages


                    : : Diesel : :

                    D=
iesel: Great, glad to have you with us.

                    He transformes=
 back to truck mode.

                    Diesel: Lets continue on our way!=


                    He continues to drive on.
                      -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                      From: LurkerAbyss 
         =
             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: Wednes=
day, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
                      Subject: Re: Secret Mess=
ages


                                                                    =
                                                                   : : Stin=
g : :

                                                                    =
                                          Sting smiles, and nods, acknowled=
ging the offer.

                                                          =
                                                    Sting:  It would be a p=
leasure to aid you all.
                        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                        From: RoboRick007 
                        To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Wednesday, August 14, =
2002 12:43 AM
                        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      =
                  : : Diesel : :

                        Diesel takes Stin=
g's hand and shakes it. Diesel had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

  =
                      Diesel: I have a proposition for you, Sting. We are o=
n our way to Earth, of the past, through the Transwarp rift. We plan to bui=
ld a great army. Would you like to join us?

                        Diesel=
 waited for a reply.
                          ----- Original Message -----=
 
                          From: LurkerAbyss 
                          To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                          Sent: Wednesday, August=
 14, 2002 12:06 AM
                          Subject: Re: Secret Messages

=

                                                                          =
                                                                : : Sting :=
 :

                                                                       =
                                               Sting nods and then smiles a=
 bit.
                              
                                      =
                                                                           =
Sting:  It's a pleasure to meet you all.

                                 =
                                                                  He extend=
s his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a handshake.
                        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: RoboRic=
k007 
                            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
             =
               Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
                    =
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                            : : Dies=
el : :

                            Diesel transforms to his robot mode.

 =
                           Diesel: I am Diesel.

                          =
  He motions to the others.

                            Diesel: This is Ar=
row and Deemos.
                              ----- Original Message ----- =

                              From: LurkerAbyss 
                         =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                              Sent: Tuesda=
y, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
                              Subject: Re: Secr=
et Messages


                                                             =
                                                                          :=
 : Sting : :

                                                             =
                                                    He walks closer, and ge=
ts ready to speak.

                                                       =
                                                            Sting:  Hi.  It=
's Sting.  Who are you?
                                ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                                From: RoboRick007 
             =
                   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                            =
    Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
                               =
 Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                : : Diesel =
: :

                                The dark tanker sees as this mysteriou=
s bot, Sting, drops down infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks s=
creeching to a stop.

                                Diesel: Who are you, =
and what do you want?
                                ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                                From: LurkerAbyss 
               =
                 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                              =
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                                S=
ubject: Re: Secret Messages


                                             =
                              : : Sting : :

                              =
                      A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending f=
rom the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Dee=
mos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
                    =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                                F=
rom: RoboRick007 
                                To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
=
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            =
                    : : Diesel : :

                                Diesel =
pulls out, following the others towards their destination.
                =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                             =
   From: Hollywood Narrator 
                                To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 200=
2 9:47 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  =
                              Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. He whips =
around on a dime and speeds towards the destination. Deems transforms into =
a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

                           =
     ----- Original Message -----
                                From: Rob=
oRick007
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
       =
                         Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:29 PM
           =
                     Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                       =
         : : Diesel : :

                                He smiled at his f=
riends excitment.

                                Diesel: Alright lets go =
get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

  =
                              Diesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

 =
                               Diesel: Roll out!

                         =
       He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the wa=
y.
